EmailTemplate.name: Global_Content Syndication_The Cloud Native Journey_eBook_Q116.Embarking Confirm
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for downloading the The Cloud Native Journey eBook authored by Michael Cot√©, Director of Field Engineering at Pivotal.
In case you missed it, we have an on-demand Cloud Native Journey Webinar Series that you might find interesting. You can view the recordings on-demand, view the SlideShare presentations, and learn more about the journey to becoming Cloud Native here <[[http://pivotal.io/cloud-native-journey-webinar-series?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=Duncan-Winn-OReilly-Cloud-Native-eBook-Q116]]>.
Also, if you're interested in getting a free, cloud native readiness assessment consultation, please email cnr_assessment@pivotal.io <[[mailto:cnr_assessment@pivotal.io]]> with a good time to talk. The call, which shouldn't take longer than 30 minutes, will help you gauge your organization's position with respect to kicking off your digital transformation strategy.
No matter where you are in your journey, keep up on the latest Pivotal Cloud Foundry developments and success stories with our blogs <[[https://blog.pivotal.io/]]>, podcasts <[[http://blog.pivotal.io/podcasts-pivotal]]>, and on Twitter <[[https://twitter.com/pivotalcf/]]>.
Thank you, The Pivotal Team
